title: Orion ODA System and Architecture
summary: Comprehensive overview of the Orion Ontology-Driven Architecture (ODA), detailing its core principles, workspace organization, and the Dual-Layer Governance Enforcement Model. It documents the transition to user-specific subdirectories (park-kyungchan/palantir), the implementation of the /00_start initialization workflow (including virtual environment setup and dependency management), troubleshooting of empty config states and hardcoded legacy paths, and the v5.0 Deep Audit protocol. The system includes programmatic gate checks, a Unified Cross-LLM Protocol in GEMINI.md, and high-fidelity environment maintenance procedures.
